dict.acceptation: 疯狂的；猛烈的；着迷的；〔口语〕愤怒的，生气的；

sent.orig: The determent policy has been dubbed MAD appropriate acronym which stands for mutual assured destruction.
sent.trans: 核禁“政策”称为MAD,很贴切，是表示保证互相毁灭的缩合字。

sent.orig: "Queer" is the word often used euphemistically for "mad".
sent.trans: “Queer” 这个词常用作 “mad” 的委婉语。

sent.orig: The determent policy has been dubbed MAD, an acronymstands for mutual assured destruction.
sent.trans: 核禁政策称为MAD,很贴切，是表示保证互相毁灭的“缩”合字。

sent.orig: Beijing architects MAD have designed a skyscraper for Chongqing, China, with gardens at each level.
sent.trans: 北京设计事务所MAD设计的重庆摩天楼，该设计每层设计有花园。

sent.orig: The relatively short (?) of mat and the relatively long (?) of mad are allophones.
sent.trans: mat中较短的？和mad中的较长的？是语音变体。
